mapper.select: select user_barcode from wp_user_barcodes where id=#{id}
select RECEIPT_BARCODE from WP_useHistory where rownum =1 and buydate = (select MAX(buydate) from WP_useHistory)
select user_barcode from wp_user_barcodes where rownum =1 and user_barcode = (select MAX(user_barcode) from wp_user_barcodes)
mapper.update: update wp_product_barcodes set all_count=all_count-#{product_count} where product_barcode = #{product_barcode}
update wp_product_barcodes set all_count=all_count + #{product_count} where product_barcode = #{product_barcode}
mapper.delete: delete from wp_useHistory where product_barcode = #{product_barcode} and user_barcode=#{user_barcode} and buydate= TO_DATE(#{buydate},'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
mapper.update: update wp_user_barcodes set wallet=#{wallet} where id = #{id}
